评论详情: This is a nice dress with a very unique design. It looks elegant and sexy. A good purchase.

I bought this dress for black tie event. There was nothing formal about the dress! It was pretty and fit well, but cheaply made.  I would wear this for a night at a lounge or club but not for any type of upscale formal event. It is going back!

I used this dress for my brother’s backyard wedding. It was really comfortable and the one sleeve stayed in place, I worry with designs like this that they will slip off but it stayed. I also really liked how there was an opening in the leg area, it made it more elegant. The material of the dress was a bit thin, I wish it was a bit thicker so that it fit better. It was easy to wash it and take care of it.
This dress fit me to the T and everyone asked where I got it and that I looked beautiful
It’s not TERRIBLE. But looks very cheap, feels very cheap, and doesn’t fit properly. I ordered an XS and the one arm thing doesn’t fit how it fits the model.
This is a very cute dress. I am 5'4 and it was a little long on me. The quality is very nice no smells. It is more of a casual dress and the material is cotton. Can be dressed up with accessories.
this dress is perfect for a fall/winter event- from the fabric and cut to the style and color. it is well made and fits true to size.

I absolutely love this dress! I ordered a size small, even though I usually wear a medium, and it fits perfectly thanks to the stretchy fabric. The material feels lightweight and comfortable, making it easy to wear for hours without feeling restricted. The off-shoulder design and side slit give it a stunning appearance. It’s both stylish and practical, and the stretchy fit makes it super flattering.

评论概述: Nice all around dress - a solid evening performer - plus it looks great!
评论详情: Overall: Recommended but it is a unique fit so make sure you look at it closely before you get it. Great to wear in general and the comfort is there. Stylish and with a great fit these seem durable and well made enough. Cheers

The Aigeman Women Off Shoulder Long Sleeve Maxi Dress is stunning. It arrived in a vacuum sealed bag so it needed to run through the dryer on a medium setting long enough to remove any wrinkles. It’s very soft and fits like a glove. It’s sewn & designed very well. Can be worn for formal or casual occasions.
very large fit and a bit odd in the shoulders for me. I am quite petite. May work on others, didn't for me.

This dress is made with a simple material. It is thin and ribbed and seems like a casual material so it is not stiff and formal feeling (even though the style of the dress is kind of sexy and a little more formal.  So its like you are dressing up but not really because the material is more casual. The medium is good for me - I am 5'7" AND 150 lbs.  Nice slit, comfortable and looks good.

This is a bit loose.  But the concept is very nice.  Material is ribbed and the slit in the front is conservative so this makes a nice going out dinner dress which I love.  Soft and the off the shoulder is nice and sits well on the shoulder.
